text: Tarapara yakhana taderake allaha bamciye dilena, takhana'i tara prthibite anacara karate lagala an'yaya bhabe. He manusa! Sona, tomadera anacara tomadera'i upara parabe. Parthiba jibanera suphala bhoga kare na'o-atahpara amara nikata pratyabartana karate habe. Takhana ami batale deba, ya kichu tomara karate.
